text: Our client, a leading Non Profit Organization, is currently looking for an entry level developer with an interest in the health care field.
This is a fully remote contract to hire opportunity

li: Graduation from a Coding Bootcamp and/or Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
li.1: Strong interest in Health Care Policy
li.4: Knowledge or experience with a coding language such as: Java, JavaScript, Python, SQL, R, SAS

li: Develop and test measure coding using CQL as well as developing test cases for quality measures.
li.1: Gather information for research on the development of digital HEDIS measures.
li.2: Participate in relevant standards development activities.
